name: Pumpkin Farmer
description:
Welcome to Pumpkin Farmer!



Would you help this farmer find his pumpkin?

This game was rated 5 out of 5 pumpkins.

Story base:

This game is a 5 minute game about you helping Pampoen find his lost pumpkin.
All the games I have made come with a twist that many don't expect.

Features:
Almost everything is intractable.
The game may be short but it will leave an impression (hopefully).

Extras:

I would like to give a big thank you to everyone who plays my games. I hope you enjoy this game.

You can find my free betas on itch, all done by FrozenMelter.
